title: Commission : Harpie's Pet Dragon
content: Commission for a good friend of mine. It's not normally something I would take as a commission since I haven't drawn dragons in ages and this is not from something I'm a fan of. However, for a friend, I'm willing to go out of my comfort zone more. It was pretty fun to draw and very different.
